languages.text: {n}Свет на мостике совсем сходит с ума — или это ваше зрение мутится от боли? Все вид-скрины огромного когитатора вспыхивают разом, и на каждом сотню раз повторяется текст:{/n} "Не прогоняй нас. Не прогоняй нас. Не прогоняй нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Свет на мостике совсем сходит с ума — или это ваше зрение мутится от боли? Все вид-скрины огромного когитатора вспыхиваюи разом, и на каждом сотню раз повторяется текст:{/n} "Не прогоняй нас. Не прогоняй нас. Не прогоняй нас".

languages.text: {n}The light on the bridge goes haywire — or is it the pain making your eyesight play tricks on you? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."
languages.original_text: {n}Свет на мостике совсем сходит с ума — или это ваше зрение мутится от боли? Все вид-скрины огромного когитатора вспыхивают разом, и на каждом сотню раз повторяется текст:{/n} "Не прогоняй нас. Не прогоняй нас. Не прогоняй нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}The light on the bridge starts shifting madly — or is it your eyesight playing tricks on you because of the pain? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

{n}The light on the bridge goes haywire — or is it the pain making your eyesight play tricks on you? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

{n}The light on the bridge goes haywire — or is it the pain making your eyesight play tricks on you? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

languages.text: {n}ブリッジの上のライトはひどく乱れていた。あるいは、痛みによってあなたの視界がおかしくなっているのかもしれない。考算機の各スクリーンのライトはすぐにつき、そしてその各々は同じテキスト行を何度も何度も、何百回と繰り返している：{/n}「我々を追い払わないでください。追い払わないでください」
languages.original_text: {n}The light on the bridge goes haywire — or is it the pain making your eyesight play tricks on you? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

traits.locale_text: {n}ブリッジの上のライトはひどく乱れていた。あるいは、痛みによってあなたの視界がおかしくなっているのかもしれない。考算機の各スクリーンのライトはすぐにつき、そしてその各々は同じテキスト行を何度も何度も、何百回と繰り返している：{/n}「我々を追い払わないでください。追い払わないでください」

languages.text: {n}舰桥上的灯光开始闪烁……或是疼痛让你的视力出了问题？每个沉思者的屏幕都立刻亮了起来，不断重复同一行文字，长达数百遍。{/n}“不要把我们赶走。不要把我们赶走。不要把我们赶走。”
languages.original_text: {n}The light on the bridge goes haywire — or is it the pain making your eyesight play tricks on you? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

traits.locale_text: {n}舰桥上的灯光开始闪烁……或是疼痛让你的视力出了问题？每个思考器的屏幕都立刻亮了起来，不断重复同一行文字，长达数百遍。{/n}“不要把我们赶走。不要把我们赶走。不要把我们赶走。”

languages.text: {n}Das Licht auf der Brücke spielt verrückt. Oder ist es der Schmerz, der deine Sicht beeinträchtigt und dir das vorgaukelt? Alle Vid-Bildschirme des Cogitators leuchten gleichzeitig auf, und auf allen steht derselbe Text, wieder und wieder, hunderte Male:{/n} "Schickt uns nicht fort. Schickt uns nicht fort. Schickt uns nicht fort."
languages.original_text: {n}The light on the bridge goes haywire — or is it the pain making your eyesight play tricks on you? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Licht auf der Brücke spielt verrückt. Oder ist es der Schmerz, der deine Sicht beeinträchtigt und dir das vorgaukelt? Alle Vid-Bildschirme des Cogitators leuchten gleichzeitig auf, und auf allen steht derselbe Text, wieder und wieder, hunderte Male:{/n} "Schickt uns nicht fort. Schickt uns nicht fort. Schickt uns nicht fort."

languages.text: {n}Les lumières de la passerelle semblent devenir folles... ou est-ce la douleur qui vous fait halluciner ? Tous les écrans du cogitateur s'allument en même temps et chacun d'entre eux répète la même ligne de texte des centaines de fois :{/n} « Ne nous renvoyez pas. Ne nous renvoyez pas. Ne nous renvoyez pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}The light on the bridge goes haywire — or is it the pain making your eyesight play tricks on you? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lumières de la passerelle semblent devenir folles... ou est-ce la douleur qui vous fait halluciner ? Tous les écrans du cogitateur s'allument en même temps et chacun d'entre eux répète la même ligne de texte des centaines de fois :{/n} « Ne nous renvoyez pas. Ne nous renvoyez pas. Ne nous renvoyez pas. »

languages.text: {n}Las luces del puente de mando se vuelven locas; ¿o es quizá un efecto óptico causado por el dolor? Todas las videopantallas del cogitador se iluminan a la vez, y en todas aparece la misma frase que se repite un centenar de veces:{/n} «No nos expulsen. No nos expulsen. No nos expulsen».
languages.original_text: {n}The light on the bridge goes haywire — or is it the pain making your eyesight play tricks on you? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las luces del puente de mando se vuelven locas; ¿o es quizá un efecto óptico causado por el dolor? Todas las videopantallas del cogitador se iluminan a la vez, y en todas aparece la misma frase que se repite un centenar de veces:{/n} «No nos expulsen. No nos expulsen. No nos expulsen».

languages.text: {n}Köprünün ışıkları kontrolden çıkıyor... Yoksa acıdan gözlerin sana oyun mu oynuyor? Kavramsayarın video ekranlarının her biri aynı anda aydınlanıp aynı metni gösteriyor. Tekrar, tekrar ve tekrar... Aynı yazıyı yüzlerce defa sergiliyorlar.{/n} "Bizi kovmayın. Bizi kovmayın. Bizi kovmayın."
languages.original_text: {n}The light on the bridge goes haywire — or is it the pain making your eyesight play tricks on you? Each of the cogitator's vid-screens lights up at once, and each one is repeating the same line of text, over and over, hundreds of times:{/n} "Do not send us away. Do not send us away. Do not send us away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Köprünün ışıkları kontrolden çıkıyor... Yoksa acıdan gözlerin sana bir oyun mu oynuyor? Kavramsayarın video ekranlarının her biri aynı anda aydınlanıyor ve aynı metni gösteriyor. Tekrar, tekrar ve tekrar... Yüzlerce defa aynı yazıyı sergiliyor:{/n} "Bizi kovmayın. Bizi kovmayın. Bizi kovmayın."
